author: Alywin
title: Truly in paradise!
review:
This small set, 2870 - Paradisa Barbeque, is truly tiny.  There are only 15 bricks plus a minifig.  However, this set demonstrates the powerfulness of LEGO that you can use so few pieces to do a fanastic scene, as well as how you can make your own funny story but just such a few pieces.  

Among one of the legendary Paradisa theme, you got a pink dressed lady minifig.  Also, you have quite a few rare items including dark pink bricks and a black cat.

I easily created a lot of lovely scene out of this small set and enjoyed very much.  This is among the most valuable sets to collect!

author: DeesjeNL
title: Lovely little set to complement a yard or rooftop
review:
While digging through my box with old Legos, I found this little set. I immediately added it to the rooftop of my Corner Garage (modular house), because I felt it was very bare up there. I'll be replacing the pink bricks, but the rest of the scene really fits so well.

The details in this set are great, the pizza, the grill, the pan. And the black cat! I have two myself, so that's a little something that connects me to the scene. The minifig wears a cute printed top, but I have seen the hair/face combo before.

I think this is a lovely set to add to a backyard, park or rooftop setting. Who's in for a bbq party?!
